const response = await client.indices.putTemplate({
  name: "template_1",
  index_patterns: ["te*"],
  order: 0,
  settings: {
    number_of_shards: 1,
  },
  mappings: {
    _source: {
      enabled: false,
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
